full_summary:
**Tender Announcement: Automated Airline Hosting and Aircraft Tasking System (AAHATS)**

**Title:** 
* English: ACAN Automated Airline Hosting and Aircraft Tasking System (AAHATS)
* French: PAC Système Hôte Automatisé de Lignes Aériennes et d'Assignation d'Aéronefs

**Reference Number:** WS4188053755-Doc4188937392

**Release Date:** September 1, 2023

**Closing Date:** September 21, 2023, 14:00 EDT

**Background:**

The Department of National Defence (DND) requires an Automated Airline Hosting and Aircraft Tasking System (AAHATS) to support its airlift resources. The system must be capable of monitoring flights throughout their various phases and provide access to a passenger reservation system with related equipment installed at various locations across Canada.

**Key Requirements:**

* Provide an Automated Airline Hosting and Aircraft Tasking System that meets DND's requirements
* Ensure the system can monitor flights throughout their various phases
* Provide access to a passenger reservation system
* Ensure related equipment is installed at various locations across Canada

**Notice Type:**

This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN), indicating that the contract has been awarded to a supplier following the evaluation of tenders.

**Selection Criteria:**

The contract will be awarded to the supplier with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.

**Trade Agreements:**

This tender is open to suppliers who have a valid contract with the Government of Canada under one of the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement

**Contracting Authority:**

The Contracting Authority is the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of DND.

**Contact Information:**

For more information, please contact Lynn Levesque, Contracting Officer, PSPC, at [lynn.levesque@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto
